attributes.action: allow an act of Parliament that allows the people of the United Kingdom to ask for elections
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the recent poor performance of the Prime Minister, we call for an Act of Parliament that will allow for a general election if at least 1% of the electorate in at least 326 constituencies write to the Sargeant of Arms and ask for an election

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
